lead_paragraph: Coach Bobby Bowden said he did not think Florida State would have to forfeit games for using ineligible players this season. “We didn’t know anyone was ineligible,” he said Thursday. Bowden has 373 career victories, the most in major college football history. About two dozen Florida State players have been suspended for the Music City Bowl against Kentucky for cheating on an online exam.
